description_html:
Kravet Contract introduces a new Guaranteed in Stock program featuring value priced upholstery targeted for performance and style.

Thirteen playful patterns and textures are featured along 85 color combinations. Ranging from soft and serene to bold candy color combinations this collection features multi-color patterns and textures all priced to fit tight budgets.

Exceeding all ACT standards for performance, budget priced and guaranteed in stock, this collection is sure to hit a sweet spot.
